message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $13,000 to start negotiations.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but the value this product brings is truly unique. How about we meet closer to the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,800? I think that's a fair price for both of us.
